welcome: Welcome! This bot lets you upload videos to Hydrax. Use /ayuda for help.
choose_lang: Which language do you want to use?
help:
Send a video or a direct link to upload to Hydrax. Commands:
/setlang - Change language
/list - View queue
/cancel_list - Cancel queue
/cancel - Cancel operation
/add <user_id> - Authorize user
/remove <user_id> - Remove user
/log - Show log
/ads - Send ad
/ping - Measure latency
/server - Active server
/hapi - Set Hydrax API
not_authorized: You are not authorized to use the bot.
not_admin: Only the creator can use this command.
user_notfound: User not found or already unauthorized.
server_info:

Other servers will be available in the future.
hapi_prompt: Send your Hydrax API to configure.
